item.description: Notes This queue-base is particularly finicky with piece order. Practice: https://jstris.jezevec10.com/play/mode/2971 Setups IS ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gQ4IeR4BeQ4Eeg0Q4BtR4Dei0BtQ4zhJeAgH.png]] ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gA8Bti0wwilB8BtA8g0xwRpF8wwglRpJ8JeAgH.png]] SO ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gQ4IeR4BeQ4Eeg0Q4BtR4RpBei0BtQ4RpLeAgH.png]] ![[attachments_fumen/v115@9gA8Btzhglh0B8BtA8ilg0wwH8xwH8g0wwJeAgH.png]] LO ![[attachments_fumen/v115@JhglBeRpBeg0BeglBtRpR4g0BehlBtR4h0JeAgH.png]] !

item.title: First Perfect Clear
item.description: Setups [[perfect-clears/1st/Perfect Clear Opener]] [[perfect-clears/1st/Jigsaw]] v115@9gzhFeh0BtFeg0RpBtEeg0RpQeAgH Sol: 98.333% v115@DhzhFeR4hlEeR4RpglGeRpglJeAgH Sol: 98.214%

item.title: Fumen
item.description: Fumen is a board editor made by knewjade. It is the most commonly used board editor and allows the exporting of multiple board states in a single fumen code.

item.title: Jigsaw
item.description: Jigsaw is a high scoring first, sacrificing solve% for scoring. It has a 100% build chance, considering mirrors, and the less efficient alternate build.

item.title: Parameter: Patterns
item.description: The –patterns parameter for [[sfinder-docs/solution-finder|solution-finder]] is one of the harder parameters to understand. Patterns, in this case, is synonymous with queues, but potentially more broadly defined.

item.title: Perfect Clear Opener
item.description: Shortened as PCO. An opener for getting a perfect clear. The build rate is 100% if an [[#alternative build]] is considered.

item.title: Perfect Clears
item.description: Here are setups for various perfect clears. More to come later Categories [[perfect-clears/1st/1st_index|1st PC]] [[perfect-clears/2nd/2nd_index|2nd PC]] 3rd [[perfect-clears/dpc/dpc_index|DPC]] 4th 5th 6th [[perfect-clears/7th/7th|7th PC]] 8th 9th

item.title: Solution Finder
item.description: Solution Finder, often referred to as sfinder, is a program created by knewjade, who’s also responsible for various other tools. It is the cornerstone of Tetris-related research such as for openers, loops, and perfect clearing.

item.title: Solution Finder Prerequisites
item.description: Here are a bunch of prerequisites for sfinder and its branches. Command Line Interface Command Line Interface is a terminal used to run programs.

item.title: Solution Finder: Cover
item.description: Solution Finder’s Cover command outputs the probability of setting up/buidling a specified field (or multiple), given a specified pattern. This output is written in the terminal and the specified log path.

item.title: Solution Finder: Path
item.description: [[sfinder-docs/solution-finder|Solution Finder]]’s Path command outputs all the ways to get a perfect clear from a specified field, given a specified pattern.

item.title: Solution Finder: Percent
item.description: Solution Finder’s Percent command outputs the probability of getting a perfect clear from a specified field, given a specified pattern. This output is written in the terminal and the specified log path.

item.title: Solution Finder: Spin
item.description: [[sfinder-docs/solution-finder|Solution Finder]]’s Spin command outputs all the ways to get a specified spin (TS0, TSS, TSD, and Mini Variants) from a specified field, given a specified pattern.
